context: Confinity merged with X.com (Elon Musk's company) in March 2000. PayPal dominated eBay payments with 40% of transactions. eBay's Billpoint had only 15% of sellers vs PayPal's 60%.

competitors.name: Billpoint
competitors.notes: eBay's payment system with Wells Fargo, only 15% seller adoption

competitors.name: X.com
competitors.notes: Elon Musk's online banking company, merged with Confinity

competitors.name: Western Union
competitors.notes: Traditional money transfer service going online
